options.command: bash -lc 'cd apps/ios-app && if [ -f Package.swift ]; then swift build; else xcodebuild -project HealthCheckerApp.xcodeproj -scheme HealthCheckerApp -sdk iphonesimulator -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15" build; fi'
bash -lc 'cd apps/ios-app && if [ -f Package.swift ]; then swift run HealthCheckerApp; else echo "Run is only supported for SwiftPM packages. Open the Xcode project and run the app there."; fi'

bash -lc 'cd apps/ios-app && if [ -f Package.swift ]; then swift test; else xcodebuild -project HealthCheckerApp.xcodeproj -scheme HealthCheckerApp -sdk iphonesimulator -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15" test; fi'
